description:
Miyano finally knows how he feels. Although he doesn`t know it, Miyano repays all the wisdom and advice Ogasawara gave him. Despite his newfound confidence in his feelings, Miyano struggles to find the right time to tell Sasaki. Did he wait too long?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Kono Kanjou o Dou Shitara Ii.
What Do I Do About These Feelings?
この感情をどうしたらいい.
